feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from visitballyhoura

entry.title: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders cre
entry.content: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders crew @ballyhouratrailriders 3. A bike shop with all the essentials, like bike gear, spare tubes, snacks and coffee 4. Toilets 5. A bike wash (€2 required) 6. Showers (2 x €1 coins required) 7. Picnic tables for post-ride munchies And a fantastic community atmosphere, especially on weekends. With over 98km of mountain biking trails, including recent exciting new additions to the network, don't miss the chance to ride here. @Munster Vales @Ireland’s Hidden Heartlands @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie @Tourism Ireland #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Irelandtravel #ballyhouraforest #coillteoutdoors #mountainbiking #mtb #mtblife #mtblovers

entry.title: A huge welcome home for Oisín O'Callaghan & Ronan Dunne at the Ballyhoura Trail Centre last night, to celebrate their epic race season. These legends have made Irish mountain biking history, by coming 🪙🥈 at the Elite Men's Downhill World Cup in Snowshoe,
entry.content: A huge welcome home for Oisín O'Callaghan & Ronan Dunne at the Ballyhoura Trail Centre last night, to celebrate their epic race season. These legends have made Irish mountain biking history, by coming 🪙🥈 at the Elite Men's Downhill World Cup in Snowshoe, USA. We couldn't be prouder! @Oisin O Callaghan @Rónán @Munster Vales @Ireland’s Hidden Heartlands @Discover Ireland @Tourism Ireland @Cycling Ireland @UCI @YT Industries 🤘 @Nukeproof #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #BallyhouraForest #MountainBiking #mtb #mtblife #downhill #worldcup #mtblovers #ytindustries #liveuncaged

entry.title: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed?
entry.content: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed? Let us know below ⬇️ @Munster Vales @Ireland’s Hidden Heartlands @Tourism Ireland @Break the Resistance @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Irelandtravel #ballyhouraforest #coillteoutdoors #mtb #mtblife #mtbtips #mountainbiking #mtblover

entry.title: Leah Maunsell takes on Toto, one of the new black trails in the Ballyhouras. Leah is the 9 x women's Elite Irish Enduro National Champion 🇮🇪 and the Ballyhouras are her local. Have you tried the new trails yet? Let us know what you think below ⬇️ @Leah @
entry.content: Leah Maunsell takes on Toto, one of the new black trails in the Ballyhouras. Leah is the 9 x women's Elite Irish Enduro National Champion 🇮🇪 and the Ballyhouras are her local. entry.title: Perfect weather for discovering something a little different...🚵🏽‍♀️ The Lough Gur Cycling Loop, also called the Kilmallock Route 3, is a 62 km (~4 hours) leisurely spin from Kilmallock Library. Download the free Ballyhoura Trails app for directions or he
entry.content: Perfect weather for discovering something a little different...🚵🏽‍♀️ The Lough Gur Cycling Loop, also called the Kilmallock Route 3, is a 62 km (~4 hours) leisurely spin from Kilmallock Library. Download the free Ballyhoura Trails app for directions or head to VisitBallyhoura.com for a downloadable route map. You'll experience quiet roads, historic landmarks and stunning views of the Lough. Plus, re-fuel with a hot cuppa 🍵 at the Lakeshore Kiosk. @Munster Vales @Ireland’s Hidden Heartlands @Tourism Ireland @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Cycling #WhateverTheWeather #ThingsToDoInIreland #Winter2023 #OutdoorIreland #WinterInIreland #PerfectDiscoveringWeather #KilmallockCyclingHub
